items.sentence: I wish Tom would stop complaining all the time.
Tom couldn\'t even answer the simple questions.
Tom couldn\'t find the page he was looking for.
I\'d never have been able to do that on my own.
I\'ll be glad to help you whenever you need me.
I\'ve already asked Tom to do that three times.
I really feel like eating Chinese food tonight.
I want you to call me back as soon as possible.
I want you to do something about it right away.
I didn\'t realize that Tom\'s bill was overdue.
